channel.title: Can someone please help me
channel.description:
ok like i said im new to this :confused: 1st. i dont know how to set my port on no-ip :mad: oh im useing a broadband modem not a router so do i need a port for it or is that for routers only? 2.ive been looking for runserver in my computer i spent about 3 hours trying to find it :eek: :confused: :mad: and if i could get help with that it would be great
thank you to whoever helps me out :)
and if someone could give me live help with msn my msn is emo_guy420@yahoo.com so send me a im
thank u

item.title: Can someone please help me
item.dc:creator: @sean2 sean_
item.description:
@sean2 wrote:

i would also like to know the answer to number 1.

as for number 2, go into ur server’s folder (where ever u put that when u downloaded it) and it will probably just say run or runsever. they’re batch files, so they might have a .bat at the end

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone please help me
item.dc:creator: @kingchrist3 kingchrist3
item.description:
@kingchrist3 wrote:

For No-Ip check TUT Section and for that server you are looking for, right click start click open. Do CTRL F and do computer and type in what you want to search and it will search your hole computer.

Read full topic
